code: import axios from"axios";const apiURL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const DashboardData=async()=>{try{let res=await axios.post("".concat(apiURL,"/api/customize/dashboard-data"));return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const getSliderImages=async()=>{try{let res=await axios.get("".concat(apiURL,"/api/customize/get-slide-image"));return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const postUploadImage=async formData=>{try{let res=await axios.post("".concat(apiURL,"/api/customize/upload-slide-image"),formData);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const postDeleteImage=async id=>{try{let res=await axios.post("".concat(apiURL,"/api/customize/delete-slide-image"),{id});return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
